title: Classic Referral Webhook Schema
description: Sent whenever a classic referral event happens

referrer.title: Referrer User
referrer.description: The referrer user in who initiated this referral

referred.title: Referred User
referred.description: The referred user who initiated this referral

dateReferralStarted.title: Date Referral Started
dateReferralStarted.description: The date this referral was created

dateModified.title: Date Referral Modified
dateModified.description: The date this referral was last modified for any reason (e.g. converted, reward added, etc.)

dateUserModified.title: Date User Modified
dateUserModified.description: The date a user was added to or removed from the referral (e.g. removed as a result of user deletion)

programId.title: Program Id
programId.description: The Id of the program this code was created for

referrerUser.title: Referrer User
referrerUser.description: The userId of the referrer user (Classic-Only)

referredUser.title: Referred User
referredUser.description: The userId of the referred user (Classic-Only)

fraudSignals.title: Fraud Signals
fraudSignals.description: A set of fraud flags generated for the classic referral program (Classic-Only)

moderationStatus.title: Moderation Status
moderationStatus.description: The referral fraud moderation status for the classic program (Classic-Only)

referrerModerationStatus.title: Referrer Moderation Status
referrerModerationStatus.description: The referral moderation status for the referrer user classic program (Classic-Only)

dateReferralPaid.title: Date Referral Paid
dateReferralPaid.description: The date the referral was marked as paid (Classic-Only)

referredModerationStatus.title: Referred Moderation Status
referredModerationStatus.description: The moderation status for the referred user in the classic program (Classic-Only)

dateModerated.title: Date Moderated
dateModerated.description: The date the referral was moderated (Classic-Only)

referredReward.title: Referred Reward
referredReward.description: The rewardId of the classic program referred user's reward if available (Classic-Only)

referrerReward.title: Referrer Reward
referrerReward.description: The rewardId of the classic program referrer user's reward if available (Classic-Only)
